title: Tangy Buffalo Chicken Dip
description: Low Carb / Diabetes Friendly, Lower Saturated Fat, Lower Sodium
cleaned_text: Tangy Buffalo Chicken Dip Enjoy all the flavor of hot wings in this healthier dip form. Serves: 20 (Serving= 1/4 cup dip and 6 celery/carrot sticks) Ingredients - 8 ounces Neufchatel cheese, softened - 16 ounces plain non-fat Greek yogurt - 1 teaspoon dried parsley - ½ teaspoon dried dill - ½ teaspoon garlic powder - ½ teaspoon onion powder - 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes, reserve teaspoon for topping - 1/3 cup mild buffalo wing sauce, 300 mg or less sodium per Tablespoon (reserve 1 Tablespoon for topping) - 16 ounces plain roasted chicken breast, shredded - ½ cup blue cheese crumbles (reserve 1 Tablespoon for topping) - 60 each, 3" carrot sticks - 60 each, 3" celery sticks Directions - In a mixing bowl, beat together Neufchatel cheese and Greek yogurt with a hand mixer until smooth. - Add herbs, spices and buffalo wing sauce, and beat again until well combined. - Fold in shredded chicken and blue cheese. - Transfer to serving bowl. Sprinkle with reserved toppings. - Serve with carrot and celery sticks.
